    • Method Detail

      • setDeleteProfiles

        public void setDeleteProfiles(java.lang.Boolean deleteProfilesIn)
        Set the delete profiles flag. If set, invoking store will delete any profile that are currently associated with the tree.
        Parameters:
        deleteProfilesIn - flag indicating if profiles associated with the tree should be deleted during store()

      • store

        public ValidatorError store()
        Perform the storage Operation to the Persistence Layer. store() here actually does a remove operation. It is done to reuse code from BaseTreeEditOperation and BaseTreeAction
        Specified by:
        store in interface PersistOperation
        Overrides:
        store in class BaseTreeEditOperation
        Returns:
        ValidatorError if there was an error trying to store the object.

      • getCobblerCommand

        protected CobblerCommand getCobblerCommand()
        Get the CobblerCommand class associated with this operation. Determines which Command we should execute when calling store()
        Specified by:
        getCobblerCommand in class BaseTreeEditOperation
        Returns:
        CobblerCommand instance.
